alert.note: Alert for Caguas; Canovanas; Carolina; Gurabo; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:17AM ADT until April 08 at 1:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Caguas County in Puerto Rico... Canovanas County in Puerto Rico... Carolina County in Puerto Rico... Gurabo County in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1230 PM AST. * At 1017 AM AST, Doppler radar continues to indicate heavy rain across the warned area. This rainfall in addition to previous rains will continue to result in flash flooding. Rivers and small streams are running well above normal levels. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by excessive runoff and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Caguas; Canovanas; Carolina; Gurabo; Trujillo Alto
